summary:
Day 2 of the FiftyIn50 blogging challenge, and today's topic is:
On what subjects are you outspoken and on what subjects are you mostly mute. 
I guess it's easier to start with my mute topics as I am more reticent about those, these days, at my age.  Not wanting to be baited into conversations with people who are entrenched in a single view in the belief there are no others...
title: To Speak or not to Speak

summary: I've made it clear that I have a huge dislike of Apple's yearly update cycle for their software (and hardware, to be honest).  It's bad from a software perspective because you're giving people a lot of change all at once with a high probability that something will go wrong.  You're also constantly playing catch up with the rest of the world...
